mapper.select: select l.lid as lid ,l.lname as lname ,u.uname as tname ,l.price as price ,l.description as description ,l.subject as subject ,l.entry as entry ,l.startdate as startdate ,l.timesession as timesession ,l.imgpath as imgpath from lecture l inner join user u on l.teacher_id = u.uid where l.lid = #{lid}
